abstract: Accounts and people of note in the ad industry.
snippet: Accounts and people of note in the ad industry.
lead_paragraph: Miriam Arias, publicity director at Syfy, part of the NBC Universal unit of General Electric, joined another NBC Universal unit, iVillage, as vice president for communications. She succeeds Lauren Meller, who left, the company said, to pursue other interests.

headline.main: People and Accounts of Note in Advertising
